summary: Methane (CHâ‚„) is a simple chemical compound made of carbon and hydrogen. It's the main ingredient in natural gas and is found underground and under the sea. Methane is a powerful greenhouse gas, with human activities causing its concentration in the atmosphere to rise significantly. Reducing methane emissions can help slow down global warming and improve air quality. Interestingly, methane has also been found on other planets, like Mars.
title: Methane
